mods.abstract: We determine in almost all Manhattan lattices configurations, which for specified diameter have maximal cardinality. Cases, in which those configurations are spheres, have been studied recently by Kleitman and Fellows. For Hamming spaces we present a partial result supplementing a result of Frankl and Füredi and we formulate a general conjecture.

originInfo.publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
